VS_REQUEST_DELETING_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST.title: Account [{{uid}}] on target system cannot be deleted
VS_REQUEST_DELETING_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST.message: Account [{{uid}}] on target system cannot be deleted, becouse was not found. Make sure you first realized a request for account create!

VS_IMPLEMENTER_WAS_NOT_FOUND.title: Implementer for virtual system was not found!
VS_IMPLEMENTER_WAS_NOT_FOUND.message: Implementer [{{implementer}}] for virtual system was not found!

VS_IMPLEMENTER_ROLE_WAS_NOT_FOUND.title: Implementer`s role for virtual system was not found!
VS_IMPLEMENTER_ROLE_WAS_NOT_FOUND.message: Implementer`s role [{{role}}] for virtual system was not found!

VS_REQUEST_REALIZE_WRONG_STATE.title: Request on virtual system cannot be realized!
VS_REQUEST_REALIZE_WRONG_STATE.message: Request can be realized only if is in state [{{state}}]. This request but is in state [{{currentState}}]!

VS_REQUEST_CANCEL_WRONG_STATE.title: Request on virtual system cannot be canceled!
VS_REQUEST_CANCEL_WRONG_STATE.message: Request can be canceled only if is in state [{{state}}]. This request but is in state [{{currentState}}]!
